a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global death rate in violent political conflicts over the long run
Number of deaths per 100,000 people. Data collated from historical records by Peter Brecke. The data seeks

to include both combatant and civilian deaths in
violent political conflicts
due to fighting, disease, and
starvation. But records are incomplete, especially for the distant past and outside of Europe.
Data source: Brecke - Conflict Catalog (1999); Population based on various sources (2023)
